text: Old version of CUDA.jl. Either upgrade or use the cuda tag to request an older version. You can also force it to use artifacts, that's normally disabled on ci to save on network traffic.

elements.text: Old version of CUDA.jl. Either upgrade or use the cuda tag to request an older version. You can also force it to use artifacts, that's normally disabled on ci to save on network traffic.

text: But wouldn’t julia compat automatically make sure it uses the CUDA.jl version appropriate?
